conclusion: Need to analyze the v-t graph to determine the ratio of acceleration magnitudes for particles A and B.
Particle A accelerates from t = 0 to t = t0 with initial velocity 0 and final velocity 2v0.
Particle B accelerates from t = 0 to t = 5t0 with initial velocity 0 and final velocity v0.
Calculate acceleration for particle A: a_A = (2v0 - 0) / t0 = 2v0 / t0.
Calculate acceleration for particle B: a_B = (v0 - 0) / 5t0 = v0 / 5t0.
Determine the ratio of accelerations: Ratio = (2v0 / t0) / (v0 / 5t0) = 10.
The ratio of the magnitudes of acceleration for A and B is 10.
